features: Unique game modes related to the Harry Potter universe

comment_section_reference: If you like Harry Potter then the only server around that theme is PotterworldMC. They have been around for years and is pretty unique! [https://mc-servers.com/server/1890](https://mc-servers.com/server/1890)
